name: Community Sewing-Intermediate
description: Have you completed the Community Sewing class beginners level course, and want to continue on the fun journey of sewing. If so, this intermediate level sewing class is a great opportunity for individuals who have some sewing experience and want to expand their skills. This course will cover garment construction, seam finishing techniques, reading patterns, and pattern manipulation.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: This is a fee based service.
